roleset.name: to carry someone off by force
roleset.note: ABDUCT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls steal-10.5. FN class Kidnapping. (from abduct.01-v)
ABDUCTION-N NOTES: Framed by Claire. Maps to VN class steal-10.5, FrameNet Kidnapping. Based on verb entry abduct.01. (from abduction.01-n)

example.name: transitive (he should have gotten written consent to abduct the child?)
example.text: His solicitor wrote him a letter at the airport, with a copy to the customs authorities, saying that Bella had evidence he was drinking and unfit to have the care of [the child], whom-1 he had anyway abducted *trace*-1 without written consent.

example.name: All args
example.text: There are several accounts of this event; however, all center around his abduction of an Amazon queen.

roleset.name: move away from a central axis
roleset.note: ABDUCTION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. Framed by Katie. (from abduction.02-n)

example.name: Both args
example.text: His abduction of the left arm is impaired.
